Activities

Open Futsal

Come Join us for 5-a-side soccer every Monday for the Community

Ages: 14+

Days and Time: Mondays 6:00 - 8:30pm

Teen Center

Come Join us with a new hangout spot for teens to interact, play games, or have it as a place to study.

Ages: 12 - 17

Days and Time: 3 - 7pm

What's to Come

Mountain View Community Center Events:

Come Join us on July 19th, 2024, and August 16th, 2024, for a wonderful night with Family at our Movies in the Park event. Both movies are for everyone young or old to created memories during the summer. We will be giving away Popcorn until supplies last; Blankets, Lawn Chairs are encouraged.

Day & Time: June 19th, 2024, 10 Minutes after Sunset

Movie: Raya, the Last Dragon

Day & Time: August 16th,2024, 10 Minutes after Sunset

Movie: Elemental

Location: Mountain View Community Center (641 S Boundary St. San Diego CA, 92113)

Movies in the Park (SSD CPG)

Come Join us on July 19th, 2024, and August 16th, 2024, for a wonderful night with Family at our Movies in the Park event. Both movies are for everyone young or old to created memories during the summer. We will be giving away Popcorn until supplies last; Blankets, Lawn Chairs are encouraged.

Day & Time: July 19th, 2024, 10 Minutes after Sunset

Movie: Raya, the Last Dragon

Day & Time: August 16th, 2024, 10 Minutes after Sunset

Movie: Elemental

Location: Mountain View Community Center (641 S Boundary St. San Diego CA, 92113)

History of the Center

Mountain View was dedicated in 1914, and was one of the first parks to be dedicated in San Diego. People still talk about the great car shows that took place in the park back in the 1960s.

Directions and Bus Route

Map this location

From Interstate 805 take the Imperial Avenue exit and travel west. Turn left onto 40th Street, then left onto T Street. The facility is at South Boundary Street.
